snippet: After President Hassan Rouhani of Iran declared readiness to defend Iraq’s Shiite holy sites, Saudi leaders issued a barely veiled admonishment not to intervene.
abstract: Tensions between Iran and Saudi Arabia, Islamic rivals of the Middle East, appear to escalate over the Sunni extremist insurgency convulsing Iraq; President Hassan Rouhani of Iran declares readiness to defend Iraq’s Shiite holy sites with force; Saudi leaders issue a barely veiled admonishment not to intervene.

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and DAN BILEFSKY

lead_paragraph: After President Hassan Rouhani of Iran declared readiness to defend Iraq’s Shiite holy sites, Saudi leaders issued a barely veiled admonishment not to intervene.

headline.main: Insurgency in Iraq Widens Rivals’ Rift
headline.print_headline: Insurgency in Iraq Widens Rivals’ Rift

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
